Instruction: In a small bowl, whisk together miso paste, mirin, sake, brown sugar, and sesame oil until smooth.
Pat cod fillets dry with paper towels.
Brush cod fillets with miso glaze.
Place cod fillets on a broiler-safe baking sheet.
Broil for 4-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through and glazed.
Garnish with sliced green onions and sesame seeds.
